posts.post_content: Mode, the color pie was weird in planar chaos. That was the point. Blue became black, black became blue, white became green, green became white, and red became black. That was the point of that whole set. In fact, most of the cards in that set were just cards with the same abilities as older cards, just with different names and colors, including [Riptide Pilferer](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Riptide Pilferer) which is a blue [Headhunter](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Headhunter).
posts.html:

posts.post_content:
They really couldn't make this thing an instant? Seriously?
  
   
Somewhat useful in the current block as a sideboard card, and even then it is pretty limited. Maybe it will see some more action once Alara (read, Jund) gets out of the current block and people look to traps more.
  
   
1.5/5, grudgingly.
